title: Hello GD, I think it's time for a fun positivity selfie thread!
body:
People are being rude and mean lately so I think we should be supportive and kind instead! Show me those faces -- y'al are beautiful (except you, you know who you are).

This is me 'n' bae @ the West Edmonton Mall a few weeks ago! It was a ton of fun getting to spend time with her since she lives... In an entirely different country.

https://puu.sh/EuQwC/55f7806ea3.png
